name: CuteLiu.io
description:
CuteLiu.io

Welcome to CuteLiu.io! An apple eating game with lots of fun!

You can play this game on the web at: https://cuteliugames.github.io/CuteLiu.io/

Scores:

Red Apple - 1 point.

Green Apple - 3 points.

Golden Apple - 5 points.

Hit enemy - 3 points.

Controls:

Use your mouse to turn!

Eat as many apples as you can!

Avoid rotten apples!

Click the mouse button to throw apples!

Watch out for chickens!

Tools:

Unity

Unity Asset Store for the chicken model, skybox and terrain textures.

Paint 3D and Blender for 3D models.

Scratch (Costume editor) for some art.

Photon for the main server.

If you have any suggestions, ask me in the comments below!

<!> Please do not use any bad words or any personal information as your nickname. <!>
